name: Fishy Legs
description:
Fish people have re-settled the city of Atlantis, raised it above the Sea, and grown legs to live on firm ground! It is your duty, as the great Poseidon, to punish this offense to your underwater kingdom.

Throw your spear to destroy them all. Pick it back up and keep going! No landfish shall live!

We recommend both new and pro gamers to go through the tutorial first to learn basic controls.

Programming

  • Soulaha D. Baldé
  • Louis Horlaville
  • Rui Guo
  • Yann Dupont

Music

  • Yann Dupont

Art

  • Louis Hasenfratz
